valueProposition:
Boutique Designer Hub By Rinkie Kukreja
At Doree, we believe that every piece of clothing tells a story, and we’re here to help you weave yours. Our journey began with a shared passion for the elegance and grace that traditional attire brings to our lives. We are two friends who found joy in celebrating our roots through beautiful suits and sarees, each fabric draped with memories and dreams. With every thread, we aim to honor the craftsmanship passed down through generations while adding our own modern twist.

We pour our hearts into curating collections that reflect not just style but also the emotions tied to special moments—be it weddings, festivals, or cozy gatherings at home. Our mission is simple: to empower you to embrace your heritage while feeling comfortable and confident in your own skin. Join us as we celebrate the beauty of tradition blended with contemporary flair; let’s create unforgettable memories together, one outfit at a time!
goals: Scaling Business and increasing monthly revenue to Rs 12,000,000
